1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: The friends spend the Chinese New Year holiday with their respective families, except for Andy. After retreating to a Thailand resort after her breakup with Weiwei, she finds she's been followed by a semi-unwanted guest.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: Every family has skeletons in their closet, and each of the five beauties of 22nd floor must face theirs during the holiday season.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: Sheng Mei receives a huge blow and returns to Shanghai early. The rest of the beauties return to the 22nd floor one by one.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: The five beauties return to work after the holidays, Sheng Mei starts a new job.

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot: Andie finds it hard to reconcile her past with the future. Ying Ying is smitten with Ying Qin.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: Bao Yi Fan is in hot pursuit for Andie. Meanwhile Ying Ying vows to better herself so that she can be a good match for Ying Qin.

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: Andie seems to have opened her heart to Yi Fan, but a ghost from the past comes to haunt her.

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot: More trouble at home for Sheng Mei. Ying Ying's scared that Xiao Xiao has her eyes set on her beau.

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: Andie is entangled in an inheritance lawsuit. Guan Guan still can't quite let go of her feelings for Dr. Zhao.

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: Xiao Xiao feels she's at a disadvantage because of her lack of culture, so she decides to take lessons from Guan Guan.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: Sheng Mei is under a lot of pressure from her mom, she's driven to a corner with no one to turn to.

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: Guan Guan brings her neighbors to a blind date. Wang Bai Chuan secretly helps out Sheng Mei's family troubles.

13.title: Episode #2.13
13.plot: Guan Guan confronts her mom about the blind dates. Andie closes a chapter in her past.

14.title: Episode #2.14
14.plot: Bai Chuan's little white lies jeopardize Sheng Mei's relationship with the neighbors.

15.title: Episode #2.15
15.plot: Bao Yi Fan's mother turns against his relationship with Andie. Meanwhile, Sheng Mei and Bai Chuan's relationship hits a rough patch.

16.title: Episode #2.16
16.plot: Ying Ying's happiness seems short-lived. Xiao Xiao's brother's dubious dealings bring trouble for the family.

17.title: Episode #2.17
17.plot: Ying Ying and Ying Qin must work together to overcome an obstacle in their relationship.

18.title: Episode #2.18
18.plot: All the beauties on 22nd floor try to help Ying Ying work things out with Ying Qin.

19.title: Episode #2.19
19.plot: Another holiday is upon the beauties of 22nd floor. Ying Ying and Sheng Mei return home. Xiao Xiao escapes overseas to avoid meeting Dr. Zhao's parents.

20.title: Episode #2.20
20.plot: Yi Fan and Andie enjoy the holidays by visiting the countryside. Sheng Mei reluctantly goes home with Bai Chuan, but is humiliated by his family.

21.title: Episode #2.21
21.plot: Guan Ju Er takes up belly dancing lessons to bring out her feminine side.

22.title: Episode #2.22
22.plot: Ms. Bao's misunderstanding of Andie causes a rift between Yi Fan and Andie. Dr. Zuao helps Xiao Xiao study for her class.

23.title: Episode #2.23
23.plot: Qu Xiao Xiao's parents check out their future son-in-law.

24.title: Episode #2.24
24.plot: Ying Ying still can't get over her heartbreak, but inadvertently brings a new man into Guan Guan's life.

25.title: Episode #2.25
25.plot: Ying Ying is determined to move on from her ex. Meanwhile, Cupid seems to have finally paid some attention to Guan Guan. Yi Fan is still caught in between his mom and Andie.

26.title: Episode #2.26
26.plot: Dr. Zhao is a little irked by the way Qu Xiao Xiao conducts business. Ying Ying is still a long way from finding her happiness.

27.title: Episode #2.27
27.plot: Yi Fan and Andie turn to Xiao Xiao to smooth things over with Ms. Bao.

28.title: Episode #2.28
28.plot: Xiao Xiao's plan worked out well for Andie and Yi Fan, and now it's her turn to meet Dr. Zhao's parents.

29.title: Episode #2.29
29.plot: Andie rethinks her stance on marriage as well as her relationship with Yi Fan after attending a friend's wedding.

30.title: Episode #2.30
30.plot: Guan Guan brings Ying Ying to Xie Tong's show to cheer her up.

31.title: Episode #2.31
31.plot: Yi Fan and Andie fall into conflict over Andie's younger brother, Xiao Ming.

32.title: Episode #2.32
32.plot: Andie worries about Xiao Ming's condition. Ying Qin confides in Ying Ying about his current girlfriend troubles.

33.title: Episode #2.33
33.plot: Xiao Xiao and Dr. Zhao's relationship hits another rough patch when Xiao Xiao's rich friends think Dr. Zhao is a kept man.

34.title: Episode #2.34
34.plot: Xiao Xiao is heartbroken over the seemingly huge difference between her and Dr. Zhao. Meanwhile, Guan Guan is falling fast for Xie Tong on their trip together.

35.title: Episode #2.35
35.plot: More family troubles arise for Sheng Mei when her brother and sister-in-law arrive at her doorstep. Andie entrusts her will to Tan Zong Ming.

36.title: Episode #2.36
36.plot: Xiao Xiao pretends to be Wang Bai Chuan's girlfriend in order to make Sheng Mei's brother and sister-in-law give up the idea of leeching off Bai Chuan.

37.title: Episode #2.37
37.plot: Xiao Xiao successfully solved Sheng Mei's problem, but Bai Chuan's mom insists that he break up with Sheng Mei. Ying Qin continues to try to contact Ying Ying. Guan Guan is very disappointed by Ying Ying's immoral behavior.

38.title: Episode #2.38
38.plot: Ying Qin's fiancee violently confronts Ying Ying when she discovers the messages between Ying Qin and Ying Ying. Both Ying Ying and YIng Qin end up in the hospital where Dr. Zhao works.

39.title: Episode #2.39
39.plot: Ying Qin's mother is displeased that her son is hospitalized because of Ying Ying. However, Ying Qin is determined to get back together with Ying Ying. Xiao Xiao secretly investigates Xie Tong out of her concern for Guan Guan.

40.title: Episode #2.40
40.plot: Xiao Xiao discovers Xie Tong's unsavory past.

41.title: Episode #2.41
41.plot: Wang Bai Chuan turns to CEO Ni when his company urgently needs cash, but he is nowhere to be found. Guan Guan takes the opportunity to tell Dr. Zhao how Xiao Xiao has been since their breakup and encourages him not to miss out on the one he loves.

42.title: Episode #2.42
42.plot: Xiao Xiao confronts Ying Qin's mother. Guan Guan and Xie Tong go on a date at Shanghai Disney.

43.title: Episode #2.43
43.plot: Sheng Mei thinks her dreams are about to come true when Bai Chuan invites her to a fancy upscale restaurant for dinner.

44.title: Episode #2.44
44.plot: Andie fights back when Bao Yi Fan's mother insists on investigating her past.

45.title: Episode #2.45
45.plot: Bao Yi Fan's mother is hospitalized. Xie Tong celebrates Guan Guan's birthday with a mini concert.

46.title: Episode #2.46
46.plot: Family conflict continues at the Baos'. Ying Qin confesses his feelings to Ying Ying.

47.title: Episode #2.47
47.plot: Guan Guan is happily in love with Xie Tong and everyone on the 22nd floor is happy for her.

48.title: Episode #2.48
48.plot: Sheng Mei finds out Bai Chuan's new job at the most unexpected moment. Ying Ying is discharged from the hospital.

49.title: Episode #2.49
49.plot: Ying Ying gets a promotion while Xiao Xiao's good-for-nothing brother, Qu Lian Jie, is deep in debt.

50.title: Episode #2.50
50.plot: Xie Tong meets Guan Guan's parents.

51.title: Episode #2.51
51.plot: Xie Tong is held at the police station after a brawl in a bar. The beauties of 22nd floor are worried for Guan Guan.

52.title: Episode #2.52
52.plot: Xiao Xiao is concerned about her family's financial troubles. Sheng Mei is being sued by her brother.

53.title: Episode #2.53
53.plot: Sheng Mei and Bai Chuan go house-hunting, but feelings are hurt when it's time to decide who will be listed as the owner.

54.title: Episode #2.54
54.plot: Xiao Xiao's family troubles continue, the financial crisis having revealed that her parents have long been plotting against each other.

55.title: Episode #2.55
55.plot: Although it's not smooth sailing for everyone in love, there is a wedding on the horizon for one of the beauties of the 22nd floor. The ladies look back on the past year over hotpot.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Qiu Ying Ying, Guan Ju Er and Fan Sheng Mei share an apartment on the 22nd floor of "Ode To Joy" apartment building. Two new neighbors have recently moved in and they don't seem like the easiest people to get along with.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: The neighbors on the 22nd floor might not see eye to eye, but all is changed after a dramatic incident.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: In order to fight for family inheritance, Qu Xiao Xiao steals her brother's project right under his nose, but she might have bit off more than she can chew.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: The beauties of 22nd floor are becoming fast friends. Ying Ying introduces her boyfriend Manager Bai to her neighbors over a delicious crab dinner.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: The ladies are worried that Ying Ying is blinded by love. Fan meets up with an old friend from college. Andie finally meet up with her internet friend Singularity.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Ying Ying finally sees what a jerk Manager Bai really is. But Fan's little revenge for Ying Ying might land her in more trouble than she knows.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Andie discover some shocking news about her family. Fan has a close call with the law.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Ying Ying is left to fend for herself against Manager Bai at the office.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Ying Ying is disheartened when she is terminated at her job. Guan Guan meets a potential suitor at a class reunion. Xiao Xiao successfully wins the GI project with the help of Andie.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Qu sets her eyes on a handsome doctor.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Singularity takes Andie to a museum. Guan doesn't know what to make of Lin's offer to drive her home.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Bai Chuan gives Sheng Mei a lavish gift. Fan tells Ying Ying the hard truth with no sugar coating.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Xiao Xiao worries that she has lost her charm. Andie is asked to figure out a way to acquire Red Star.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: The internet rumors continue to spread. Xiao Xiao gives up her date with Doctor Zhao to help Andie.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Ying Ying comes up with a new idea to make money.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Guan Guan suffers a setback at work. Fan tries to distance herself from Wang Bai Chuan. Andie is figuring out how to give Wei Wei an answer.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Ying Ying runs into trouble with the neighbors downstairs. Luckily Guan Guan's senior Lin shows up to save the day.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Guan Guan goes on a blind date. Xiao Xiao makes progress with Dr. Zhao. Andie receives news about her brother.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Andie meets her brother for the first time in years.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Andie spends time getting to know her brother.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: Each of the beauties of 22nd floor have their own troubles. Andie is still concerned about her brother's welfare. Guan Guan is uncertain about how to respond to Lin's pursuit. Xiao Xiao is busy impressing her father. While Fan realize she's not as materialistic as she thinks.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Wei invites Andie to take a day trip to a privite resort. All the beauties of 22nd floor tag along for the fun.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: The beauties of 22nd floor are troubled over their respective love lives.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Andie and Fan meet new suitors at a party.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: Guan Guan meets the love of her life at a classical music concert.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Sheng Mei encounters some financial troubles at home.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: Fan is troubled by her family affairs. Andie and Wei takes a big leap forward.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: A game of bridge reveals the difference in values between Qu and Dr. Zhao.

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: Qu falls out of love, but she's not someone who gives up easily in love. Wang Bai Chuan asks Andie to help Fan's family troubles.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: Sheng Mei's family is hard pressed for money, but Sheng Mei is too proud to accept help from Andie.

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot: Sheng Mei's roommates find out about her situation. They are all worried about her, but don't know how to help.

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot: Sheng Mei's parents come to Shanghai with their grandson to seek refuge at Sheng Mei's place.

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: Sheng Mei's dad is hospitalized and in urgent need of money to pay for surgery.

34.title: Episode #1.34
34.plot: Sheng Mei's dad successfully receives surgery. Wei looks into Andie's background.

35.title: Episode #1.35
35.plot: Wang Bai Chuan helps to send Sheng Mei's parent's home. Sheng Mei rethinks her relationship with Bai Chuan.

36.title: Episode #1.36
36.plot: The ladies of 22nd floor help Sheng Mei to settle her parents. Andie seeks the help of Mr. Bao to assist Sheng Mei's brother.

37.title: Episode #1.37
37.plot: Bai Chuan meets Sheng Mei's mother. Andie's friends ponder her relationship options.

38.title: Episode #1.38
38.plot: Andie receives a severe shock from someone from her past and rethinks her relationship.

39.title: Episode #1.39
39.plot: Wei makes a last appeal to Andie. Xiao Xiao bargains with Yi Fan.

40.title: Episode #1.40
40.plot: Ying Ying connects with a past acquaintance. Xiao Xiao is confused by Dr. Zhao's actions.

41.title: Episode #1.41
41.plot: Andie doubts her past actions and turns to her friends. Guan Guan faces an uncomfortable work situation.

42.title: Episode #1.42
42.plot: The beauties of 22nd floor gather together to discuss their current happiness and future plans.

1.title: Episode #3.1
1.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: A Chinese drama about five women who live on the 22nd floor of an apartment complex in Shanghai called Ode To Joy. Andy (Tao Liu) is an incredibly successful though somewhat antisocial and reclusive businesswoman who moved to Shanghai from New York in order to find her long-lost brother. Qu Xiaoxiao (Ziwen Wang) is a somewhat spoiled girl from a wealthy family and 25-year-old woman just starting her career. Fang Shengmei (Xin Jiang) a stylish HR executive in a multinational corporation trying to shed her poor upbringing and make her way in the big city. Qiu Yingying (Zi Yang) is a small town girl trying to learn how life in the city works and one of the youngest of the five women. Guan Ju'er (Xin Qiao) A very studious young woman who is just graduated from college and completing an internship at a multinational corporation. Each has something they can learn from the others and these women develop strong friendships that they come to depend on.
imdb.title: Ode to Joy
plot: A Chinese drama about five women who live on the 22nd floor of an apartment complex in Shanghai called Ode To Joy. Andy ('Tao Liu' (qv)) is an incredibly successful though somewhat antisocial and reclusive businesswoman who moved to Shanghai from New York in order to find her long-lost brother. Qu Xiaoxiao ('Ziwen Wang' (qv)) is a somewhat spoiled girl from a wealthy family and 25-year-old woman just starting her career. Fang Shengmei ('Xin Jiang' (qv)) a stylish HR executive in a multinational corporation trying to shed her poor upbringing and make her way in the big city. Qiu Yingying ('Zi Yang' (qv)) is a small town girl trying to learn how life in the city works and one of the youngest of the five women. Guan Ju'er ('Xin Qiao' (qv)) A very studious young woman who is just graduated from college and completing an internship at a multinational corporation. Each has something they can learn from the others and these women develop strong friendships that they come to depend on.::Sarah
